title: Sheriff Gangs Still A Thing, Drones For The Home? 7.16.21
itunes:title: Sheriff Gangs Still A Thing, Drones For The Home? 7.16.21
description:
In episode 952, Jack and Miles are joined by investigative journalist Cerise Castle to discuss LASD gangs, the US Military having trained the Haitian presidents assassins, drones for the home, the old hot dog scam, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Support Knock.LA!
  2. UPDATE: LA County Democratic Party Calls for Sheriff Villanueva’s Resignation
  3. The LASD Wants to Sweep Venice, but Councilmember Mike Bonin has Other Ideas
  4. U.S. military once trained Colombians implicated in Haiti assassination plot, Pentagon says
  5. Why were Colombian ex-soldiers in Haiti? Experts say they are popular mercenaries
  6. Amazon’s Ring now reportedly partners with more than 2,000 US police and fire departments
  7. Ring Always Home Cam: Everything you need to know about the flying indoor camera
  8. Heinz Hot Dog Pact
  9. Heinz Ketchup Brokers Hot Dog Negotiations Between Wiener and Bun Companies, Demanding a Solution for Unequal Packs
  10. Kraft Heinz’s nightmare is far from over
  11. The New Shortage: Ketchup Can’t Catch Up
  12. WATCH: Father of the Bride - Hot Dogs/Hot Dog Buns
  13. Hot Dogs: Baseball Fans' Convenience, Traveler's Salvation
  14. Why Are There 10 Hot Dogs to a Pack But Only 8 Buns?
  15. Hot Dog Fast Facts
  16. LISTEN: IDK with MF DOOM, Westside Gunn, Jay Electronica - Red (Visualizer)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
